動物用藥品名稱: 馬爾他雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性鼻炎不活化混合疫苗
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎及傳染性鼻炎感染。
ingredients: INACTIVATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS STRAIN LASOTA 10^9EID50 BEFOREINACTIVATION; INACTIVATED INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS STRAINMASSACHUSETTS M41 10^7.5EID50 BEFORE INACTIVATION.INACTIVATED CULTURES OF :HAEMOPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPE A 5X10^9CFU;HAEMOPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPE C 5X10^9CFU; SORBITANMONOOLEATE 0.037ML; LIGHT MINERAL OIL 0.337ML; THIMEROSAL 50UG.
